compliments.text: I can see you are committed to your current level of understanding.
I'm jealous of everyone that hasn't met you.
Thank you for helping me, it was like doing it myself only harder.
I admire your courage to speak in the absence of knowledge.
Your food for thought leaves everyone still hungry.
Nothing lights up a room like your absence.
I wish I didn't have common sense, you seem so happy.
It's impossible to underestimate you.
You've mastered the tone of authority, without the inconvenience of depth.
You're the reason instructions have pictures.
It's interesting what you've done with your education.
It’s honestly inspiring how little you let feedback change you.
You have a unique way of dressing that no one else would attempt.
Your commitment to your perspective is almost scientific.
You’re great at speaking your mind, regardless of accuracy.
You make consistency feel optional in such a freeing way.
You’re surprisingly comfortable being seen.
I love how you’ll just wear anything.
You’re much smarter than you look.
You’re at the top of the bell curve.
I don’t care what everybody else says, I think you’re pretty cool.
You have a perfect face for radio.
My days of not taking you seriously are certainly coming to a middle.
I hope your day is as pleasant as you are.
I hope you have the day you deserve.
Out of all the people I’ve met, you are definitely one of them.
You have completely met my expectations.
You’re much nicer than I was expecting.
I love that you don’t care what people think of you.
Your skin is like citrus fruit.
You have years beyond your wisdom.
